rules_text:
Vigilance
[i][i]Invocation[/i] – [/i]Whenever you spend four or more mana to cast a spell or activate an ability during your turn, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: [i]“We are the Dawnhart Coven, stewards of life, heirs to the might of Ghrin-Danu. Nature is our blood and darkness our enemy.”[/i]
